text: Lommiswil railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Lommiswil, in the Swiss canton of Solothurn. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Solothurn–Moutier line of BLS AG and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Lommiswil: * Regio: ** hourly service between and . ** rush-hour service (except Sundays) to . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Solothurn Category:BLS railway stations
title: Lommiswil railway station
